website_summaries.verdict: Open five-toed yoga socks for the style conscious practitioner looking for sustainable grip.
pros: Comes in a rainbow of stylish colors and patterns to choose from
5-toe design allows toes to move naturally
Opening on top allows for breathability while still keeping feet fungal free
Unisex sizing from x-small to large for perfect fit
Heel stays in place and doesn’t bunch up
Grip works for poses where other yoga socks tend to slip
cons: For long-lasting wear, you must wash on gentle cycle and line or low-heat dry
Opening makes socks more flimsy, and not want to stay on feet

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable fit, bad quality!
customer_reviews.text: Such bad stitching.. the individual toe lengths are all over the place - see pic! Hurts my toes.. yes they do bunch up on the middle toes.. thread unraveling already with very light use.. would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not long lasting for the expense
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about these when they arrived. The color is great and adds a fun touch to my mostly neutral workout wardrobe. However, after maybe 4 or 5 washes they have a big run along the heel. For $16 socks, I expect them to last longer than the generic ankle socks I wear ona regular day outside of barre class. That said, the grips are quality and the comfort is A+ so maybe my pair is a fluke?
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I use this for kickboxing mainly because I don't want to walk on the Dojo's mat barefoot (especially after countless other sweaty feet have walked on it) Great grips at the soles, strong, durable, flexible, doesn't slip off as I am running, or doing any syncopated footwork. It doesn't bunch up or leave any feeling off discomfort at all. And with a shiny banging pedicure, you can definitely be the envy or better yet, role model to others. Definitely worth the price. Highly recommend! I will be buying two more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Roxcy25

customer_reviews.title: Nifty little product - cute too
customer_reviews.text: These things are pretty cool. I do a lot of yoga and mat work, and my feet generally slide when we are doing different poses. This took care of that. They look funky, and are pretty cute. The only downside is, they fit as expected, BUT when you are first "breaking them in", they seem to kind of feel tight/pull between your toes. After a couple of wears, that goes away. I have never dried them, so they have kept their shape after washing. If your feet slide on your mat, try them.
customer_reviews.author: melreviewer

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT LAST VERY LONG!
customer_reviews.text: Loved them until....DID NOT LAST VERY LONG! BOTH pair developed a tear in the ball of the foot area. I only wear them at home indoors. I DO wear them for hours a day because they actually help a pinched nerve situation between two of my toes. but even with hours a day socks shouldn't wear out so quickly INDOORS. Will be looking for a more substantial pair from another manufacturer I suppose. Any suggestions will be welcome
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for use in running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8 to 8 1/2 shoe size, depending on the shoe. The M fits me perfectly. I ordered these socks in order to wear them with my running/walking shoes due to not being able to wear regular socks. The second toe on my right foot hits the end of any regular socks I wear and causes damage to my toe nail. Yeah I know, crazy. But they work perfectly for what I need. Better than going sock less. Highly recommend. Great quality too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hot Yoga
customer_reviews.text: These are a lifesaver for hot yoga! I got into yoga then joined a 30 day trial at my local hot yoga studio for a new challenge. By the end of the classes I am drenched, no joke, and with these my feet never slip! Even when my hands do, I always have a firm grip in my feet for stability. They don't feel extra hot or anything and are comfortable. The 4 stars is for the toe holes/stitching. Came apart a little and the toe holes are a little tough to work with. Overall, these are a good investment for yoga, Pilates, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice grippy toeless socks for my yoga sessions
customer_reviews.text: I really love these - I have a pair of winter socks that are like gloves and have a knitted space for each toe and love them as well. I think some people may not like these if the feel of even this finely-knit sock between their toes bothers them. Me, because of my winter socks, I knew these would be great for me. The dots on the bottom grip well and make me feel a bit safer when performing stand up yoga. Would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Martin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair because I love them. I was looking for something to reduce slipping during yoga poses - these totally do the trick. I chose this particular style because I definitely wanted my toes exposed and able to move freed, and I thought that the styles that did NOT have individual toe holes would slip around on my foot. I wear a 6.5 shoe and bought small. The toe holes are slightly tight when new but loosen up within one or two wears.
customer_reviews.author: deb O

customer_reviews.title: Size down for best fit
customer_reviews.text: Love these, use for yoga and martial arts. I wear a size 10/11 shoe and found that the Large sox fit me well but once I started using them they stretched a bit and moved around too much to be comfortable. I switched to the Medium and that works great.
customer_reviews.author: K. Capps

customer_reviews.title: Size down, don't buy for just pilates
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 6 shoe so I bought size small. They are too big and bunch up at the heel. I can't tell if there is a right/left sock, so I was unsure which one to put on which foot. I planned to use these for Pilates but the extra fabric at the heel (for barre work) gets in the way. My mistake for not anticipating that. They don't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for jumping on rebounder (mini trampoline)
customer_reviews.text: I got these to wear while jumping on my bellicon rebounder (mini trampoline). They are wonderful! They grip the mat but still allow me to feel it with my toes. The material is very comfortable and they fit perfectly. This was a trial order to see if I liked them. I do, and I will be ordering additional pairs in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth BlueTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great product
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my qigong class and they were a little pricey, but they’ve been better than any shoes I’ve tried. The grip is great for everything we do except for holding a wide leg stretch. They do slip from the inside. I’d still recommend these unless your daily routine is to do long wide stance stretches repeatedly. Very comfortable between the toes as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marg422

customer_reviews.title: Scammed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair of socks almost two years ago. My fault for not wearing them right away. I took them to an exercise class and as I was trying to put them on, quickly figured out that both socks are cut for the same foot. Too late now to get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Mayi Morales

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I love toesox! I had a pair for two years before I got a new pair to replace them. I love having the open toes and the opening on top of my foot. It keeps my feet from getting hot. The grip is really good and I don't feel the little grippies while I walk around. I wear them while I teach yoga because who wants to go barefoot in a gym! And it lets me demonstrate from anywhere, even off my mat.
customer_reviews.author: B. Newcomb

customer_reviews.title: Run large
customer_reviews.text: I am excited to use them, however, I had to return and order a smaller size. Im a w11 and the large 11-13 were ginormous! Ordered a medium. Should be here in a few days!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product came with hole
customer_reviews.text: These grip socks were sent as a replacement. They came with a hole already in one of the socks. This is second pair that arrived with hole in them. I have a feeling they may be knock offs. Will order directly from ToeSox.
customer_reviews.author: ShaniMax

customer_reviews.title: Love the colour
customer_reviews.text: Love the colour!! The first time were tighter (more at the top) but they became comfortable :) until the toes of one side went all the way down of my toes and were super uncomfortable :S Had to pull them back to keep working.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars if I could
customer_reviews.text: If you have really long toes like I do this will not fit well. My feet swell when I do yoga and this hurt badly and I had to toss these out.
customer_reviews.author: glockgirl1723

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pilates
customer_reviews.text: I found my feet slipped in Pilates reformer class making me feel unsteady with balance exercises. These comfy socks solved the problem. They fit well and have survived many washings. They come with or without covered toes so be careful to order the right one.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Girl

customer_reviews.title: Extremely cute & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Extremely cute & comfortable. Bought these for Pilates and they're great! Worn and washed them multiple times and they still keep their shape and fit. Just bought another pair in a different color!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: ... my workouts in my apartment and I don’t really like to wear shoes indoors
customer_reviews.text: I do almost all my workouts in my apartment and I don’t really like to wear shoes indoors. I wanted something with a little grip for my workouts and I discovered these. I use these whenever I workout in my apartment and they’ve really helped me from slipping when doing push-ups or planks.
customer_reviews.author: airazedy

customer_reviews.title: Toesox are the best
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium as I wear a size 9 shoe. I would recommend a small as the mediums move around a bit. I have tried a few different brands but feel Toesox is the best.
customer_reviews.author: ECEQUES

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these socks for my group fitness class. I love having my toes out and free but still having coverage on the bottom of my foot. The grips on the bottom are great too. And there are so many cute colors and styles.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These do not stay properly on my feet, although they are the right side. They are virtually useless for Yoga, however they work okay for Pilates since you don't use a mat. I wouldn't buy these again because I wanted them for Yoga.
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: These Sox Rock!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these non-slip socks!! Lightweight and comfortable, while still providing the function for which they were purchased -- keeping me safe when I'm in the midst of a strenuous transformer posture!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pilates and bare and the shoes are perfect, easy to wear and stays on the feet ...
customer_reviews.text: I practice yoga, Pilates and bare and the shoes are perfect, easy to wear and stays on the feet all the time that I am working out
customer_reviews.author: Adela R.

customer_reviews.title: Get your workout on in these cute socks
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Pilates. So cute! Pricey for socks but they make a difference. The nonslip is perfect. These fit so well and don’t sag or go limp.
customer_reviews.author: The Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Toesox
customer_reviews.text: Some of the cutest toesox I’ve seen. I love this brand. They wash great and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Nice socks
customer_reviews.text: Thought I'd try toeless socks for a change. They are very nice. But I think I prefer these kind of sock with full toes. I wear them for Pilates. I kept them...have worn them, nothing wrong with them. That's why I only gave 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: gabaker

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pilates
customer_reviews.text: Great for Pilates. Fabric can be a little imperfect where you put your toes in but all in all great!
customer_reviews.author: Jules P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kickboxing
customer_reviews.text: I got these for kickboxing class because it grosses me out to go barefoot in the gym. They are perfect! Very comfortable, and stay put during an intense class. For reference, I have narrow, size 10-11 feet and I got a medium.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for yoga, prevents slipping on mat!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for yoga class. After about 15 minutes, I can begin slipping on the mat. These did the trick. No more slipping at all. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I have a very cool, but sometimes slippery yoga mat. These sox help to stick my yoga moves.
customer_reviews.author: S. K. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Great for heated yoga! You don’t slide at all & can focus on holding yourpose for a long period of time instead of worrying about sliding on your mat. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Liane

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size larger than I needed on the advice of a friend that has bought them and they had plenty of room. i should have gotten the size according to my shoe size. They are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: perfect for pilates
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of these socks. I like the design and the short toes which allow my toes to extend past the fabric which is better for foot work on the reformer. I've just worn them once so I can't comment on the durability. I usually give my daughters some of my "favorite things" at Christmas and a pair of these will be on my list this year.
customer_reviews.author: katinsac

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for yoga lovers
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable. Won’t slip in my yoga mat, and they’re breathable. I live the toes being uncovered, since I have to move them freely.
customer_reviews.author: Marika Turtle Jr

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, fit great and the best color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Barre Socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks were purchased for barre class & they do exactly what is needed. They’re comfortable & fit great. They wash well & so I’ll be purchasing more. Arrived in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Good sox
customer_reviews.text: Fit well look good and are proving to be durable
customer_reviews.author: AMC Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: These are great and fit well when I put them on
customer_reviews.text: These are great and fit well when I put them on, but the heel slides off during karate class and I have to stop and put it back up a few times
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow toe holes
customer_reviews.text: Toe holes were strangely narrow and constricting. Very uncomfortable. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: sj

customer_reviews.title: Secure
customer_reviews.text: These socks provided security against slipping during yoga and Pilates exercises. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: These socks are great for Pilates
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great for Pilates. They are very comfortable and wash well. Great price as compared to the exact same ones sold at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: They fit well, but they loose shape if worn ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit well, but they loose shape if worn more than once. Washing and drying takes care of that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kiran Rajagopalan

customer_reviews.title: Yes, you should buy these...
customer_reviews.text: I read several reviews for similar socks on Amazon before going with these. They're a little more expensive than some of the others but great quality. I love them & would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Kitsune714

customer_reviews.title: perfect for helping me grip mat during yoga
customer_reviews.text: perfect for helping me grip mat during yoga. fit welland stay in place. i wash with all my other laundry. no special care needed.
customer_reviews.author: DOT

customer_reviews.title: Works well for Yoga
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a yoga instructor and she found these to be a better yoga sock to wear when she is teaching They grip well and stay put on the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Good grip
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable easy to put on & wear while doing yoga or Pilates Has good grip
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: The grippers really do grip. No slipping
customer_reviews.text: Liked the fact that they fit and grippers were sticky. I wear them for pilaties.

customer_reviews.title: Great For a Yoga Class!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my yoga class, I didn’t sweat in them and they fit perfectly for me. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great gripper socks with a lot of traction.
customer_reviews.text: Great, well made socks for exercise. These have also held up well in the wash. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Carpet or mat
customer_reviews.text: Love these for stretching and yoga on mat or carpet. Takes a little extra time to put on but worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Always gripping! Great product for a pilates instructor who lives in “toe Sox”!
customer_reviews.text: They are awesome! Just don’t place in dryer!!! Never disappointed by any of my toesox products
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy B

customer_reviews.title: Probably wont last you long
customer_reviews.text: Hole in the sock after 2 months. I haven't had this issue with any other brand. Manufacturer/Seller doesn't appear to stand behind them if you have issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great for Pilates. I bit pricey but I like the open toe style.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, but my sister in law loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D

customer_reviews.title: Fits just right but is not very well made. ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits just right but is not very well made. I can see soon it'll probably start unraveling or I'll get holes on it. It grips very well, however I wish it was more of a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Solid Toe Socks for Yoga
customer_reviews.text: So far these are working well with multiple yoga mats. I'm washing them in a mesh laundry bag and air drying, so they'll last longer. They look well constructed other than the toe area which could use additional reinforcement.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Cronan

customer_reviews.title: Toesox are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Toesox! I have several pair to wear to Pilates and they are great! They provide that extra non-slip stability essential to Pilates and Yoga.

customer_reviews.title: Great Exercise Sock - Not Best Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this sock for yoga, stretching, and other bodyweight exercises. With light use, threads are coming undone in the seams and threads in the main sock are fraying and creating holes. Really disappointed in the quality as I've used them lightly on wood flooring and yoga mats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Yoga class
customer_reviews.text: I needed these for my yoga class and they are comfortable and are non-slip. Great choice.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sox aren't as supportive as I had hoped that they would be.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Compliment galore, and they stay on the entire class secession.

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: a must for Pilates classes, plenty of grip and cute too

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are just a bit tight around the toes--but very cute!

customer_reviews.title: GiddyGirl LOVES toesox
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these socks not for Yoga or Ballet but have fallen in love with these socks for no other reason than they are EXTREMELY comfortable. After having them for awhile I had to order more. So HAPPY!

customer_reviews.title: love the various colors and the bottom grip work superb
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, fit as expected, love the various colors and the bottom grip work superb.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for myself and I love them! Great for my yoga excercises!

customer_reviews.text: I love my toesox they fit great and keep my toes supported and very warm. I get tons of compliments from people. Highly recommend them to my clients and everyone else I know.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for Pilates! Comfortable yet offers great grip and traction!

customer_reviews.text: Great for me b/c I have Psoriasis on the bottom of my feet and they need to be kept moist. I use these and can still wear flip flops.

customer_reviews.text: I use these in barre class. They've helped a ton with stability while balancing on one leg or doing lunges.

customer_reviews.text: These socks are very comfortable and wash well. They provide the extra traction needed during yoga and pilates without limiting movement.

customer_reviews.text: Love! These are comfy and great for barre workouts. The open top prevents sweaty feet and the grippy bottom stops slippage.

customer_reviews.text: love these. I use them for pilates class and they are very comfortable. No cutting between the toes or slipping in any way.

customer_reviews.text: I love these toe socks! Very cute and fit very well. Excellent quality.

customer_reviews.text: I actually didn't even pay attention to the fit when I brought it so was really happy to see that it fitted perfectly xD

customer_reviews.text: Love these! Use them every time I practice my yoga now.

customer_reviews.title: Losing Their Grip
customer_reviews.text: I am a barre instructor and wear these socks almost every day. I've had this pair for just one month, and with each class 4-5 of the sticky dots on the soles fall off. The socks are now completely bare under the balls and heels of my feet, which is exactly where you need grip! They are comfortable, although the advertised arch support is non-existent, but they have not held up well to continued use.
customer_reviews.author: T. Dalbey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & perfect size
customer_reviews.text: They are what I expected! Good quality & perfect size!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for pilates reformer class. I wear 11W womens and these fit the bill. I found them cheaper than what I paid for the first pair I got at the studio. Wash in the machine and I air dry, no shrinkage. I wish I could find some of the cuter colors in the larger size. Cheaper brands have unraveled on me.

customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. Super comfy and grippy. I worried they may feel weird, but they're really great and they look cute, too.

product_meta.title: Toesox Women's Bellarina Half Toe Grip (Black) Medium
feature_bullets: Grip: Toesox Patented Grip Sock Ensures Non Slip And Provides Secure Foot Placement During All Bare Foot Fitness Practices

DESIGN: Five toe construction allows toes to move and spread naturally. Fitted heel eliminates bunching and twisting. Arch band provides gentle pressure to lift and support. Open foot design feels barely there.
HYGIENIC: Barrier between foot and equipment protects feet from unwanted dirt and germs.

CONTENTS: All cotton is sourced certified organic. 90% Organic Cotton 8% Elastane, 2% Other Fiber. Printed socks: 58% Polyester, 32% Cotton, 8% Elastane, 2% Other Fiber. Machine washable. Wash inside out in gentle cycle. Line dry or low heat in dryer. No bleach or iron.
